§ 302101. Maintenance by Secretary The Secretary may expand and maintain a National Register of Historic Places composed of districts, sites, buildings, structures, and objects significant in American history, architecture, archeology, engineering, and culture. (Pub. L. 113–287, § 3, Dec. 19, 2014, 128 Stat. 3191.)
